MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.19pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and require our specialist team to assist with repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:48 PM on Wednesday, 30 December 2020.
